name: Universal_Button
description: Generic multi-button handler with debounce and short/long/double press events. Pluggable readers (GPIO/expanders), per-button overrides (timing/polarity/enable incl. double_click_ms), enum-friendly API, helpers, and optional time source injection for Arduino-free/RTOS use.
keywords: button, debounce, short-press, long-press, double-click, double-press, event, input, gpio, mcp23017, expander, arduino, esp32, rtos, freertos, time, millis, timefn
